name: Ball In The Jungle
description:
Change Your Graphics Quality To "Good" For Smooth Experience

System Requirement(To Play In Fantastic Graphic Quality )

RAM: 4 GB

OS: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit

VIDEO CARD: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 / ATI Radeon HD 5870 or better

SOUND CARD: No

FREE DISK SPACE: Min 20 MB

Objective

  •  Go as Far As You Can
  • Without Touching The Tress(If Touch Health Decrease-10)

Control

  • Left Arrow  To Move   "LEFT"
  • Right Arrow To Move "RIGHT"

CHALLENGE BEAT MY HIGH SCORE OF 2000
